intro: Elatostema yongtianianum, commonly known as the Yongtian starwort, is a rare species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettles and related plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered leaves and inconspicuous flowers, typical of many members of its family. It grows in moist, shaded environments, often in mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered an endangered species.
